name: Air Push
description:
How to play
  • The aim of the game is to build fans to navigate the ball to its destination.
  • The ball is yellow/orange
  • Place fans using the B key or clicking the fan icon in the top right
  • The number below the fan icon shows how many fans you can place
  • When you're finished placing fans click the play icon to start
  • You can speed up or reset by clicking the icons

I made this in about 16 hours so it's really buggy and there's only about 10 levels
